name: id
label: Unique identifier number of the study participant. This is the first column of the dataset and will be repeated when repeated measures are available per study participant.

name: mother_id
label: Unique identifier number for the mother

name: preg_no
label: Within-mother pregnancy number for each pregnancy included in the study.

name: child_no
label: Within-pregnancy birth order

name: study_id
label: Unique identifier number for the study

name: study_country
label: Country of the study

name: parity_m
label: Mother's parity based on previous born children (previous stillbirths included, abortions excluded)

name: agebirth_m_y
label: Mother's age at delivery in complete years.

name: agebirth_p_y
label: Father's age at birth in complete years.

name: agebirth_p_fath
label: Variable indicating whether the father figure in agebirth_p_y corresponds to the biological father, the social father or mother, or whether this is unknown.

name: height_m
label: Maternal height. Also indicate the corresponding method.

name: prepreg_weight
label: Pre-pregnancy weight. Also indicate the corresponding method.

name: prepreg_weight_ga
label: Gestational age of mother when early pregnancy weight was measured if early pregnancy weight is used as a surrogate for pre-pregnancy weight

name: latepreg_weight
label: Latest measurement of weight before delivery. Also indicate the corresponding method.

name: latepreg_weight_ga
label: Gestational age when late-pregnancy weight measured

name: weight_f1
label: Primary/main father figure´s weight reported in first paternal questionnaire. Also indicate the corresponding method.

name: weight_f1_fath
label: Variable indicating whether the primary father figure in weight_f1 corresponds to the biological father,  the social father or mother, or whether this is unknown.

name: height_f1
label: Primary/main father figure´s height reported in first paternal questionnaire. Also indicate the corresponding method.

name: height_f1_fath
label: Variable indicating whether the primary father figure in height_f1 corresponds to the biological father,  the social father or mother, or whether this is unknown.

name: prepreg_alc
label: Did the mother drink alcohol before pregnancy? (ever)

name: prepreg_alc_unit
label: Average units of alcohol mother drank per week before pregnancy

name: preg_alc
label: Maternal alcohol intake during pregnancy

name: preg_alc_unit
label: Average units of alcohol mother drank per week during pregnancy

name: alc_t1
label: Any alcohol intake in first trimester of pregnancy

name: alc_t2
label: Any alcohol intake in second trimester of pregnancy

name: alc_t3
label: Any alcohol intake in third trimester of pregnancy

name: prepreg_smk
label: Maternal smoking before pregnancy at any time pre-partum

name: prepreg_cig
label: Cigarettes per a day before pregnancy at any time pre-partum

name: preg_smk
label: Any smoking during pregnancy

name: preg_cig
label: Average number of cigarettes smoked per day during pregnancy

name: smk_t1
label: Smoking during first trimester of pregnancy

name: smk_t2
label: Smoking during second trimester of pregnancy

name: smk_t3
label: Smoking during third trimester of pregnancy

name: preg_dia
label: Maternal gestational diabetes during index pregnancy

name: preeclam
label: Maternal preeclampsia or HELLP syndrome during index pregnancy

name: preg_ht
label: Maternal hypertension during index pregnancy

name: ppd
label: Maternal postpartum depression after index pregnancy

name: cob_m
label: Maternal country of birth

name: ethn1_m
label: Ethnic background of mother based on country of origin (of parents)

name: ethn2_m
label: Ethnic background of mother based on colour

name: ethn3_m
label: Best estimate of mother's ethnic background based on ethn1_m or ethn2_m and study's own discretion

name: region_mo
label: Mother's region of birth, adapted from the World Bank classification

name: cob_p
label: Paternal country of birth

name: cob_p_fath
label: Variable indicating whether the father figure in cob_p corresponds to the biological father, the social father or mother, or whether this is unknown.

name: ethn1_p
label: Father's ethnic background based on country of origin (of father's parents)

name: ethn2_p
label: Father's ethnic background based on colour

name: ethn3_p
label: Best estimate of father's ethnic background based on ethn1_p or ethn2_p and study's own discretion.

name: ethn_p_fath
label: Variable indicating whether the father figure in ethn1_p, ethn2_p and ethn3_p correspond to the biological father, the social father or mother, or whether this is unknown.

name: region_fa
label: Father's region of birth, adapted from the World Bank classification

name: edu_m_
label: Maternal education based on the highest on-going or completed education. Provide repeated measures in long format. Age represents the age of the study participant in years at the time of the measurement.

name: occup_m_
label: Occupational status of the mother. Provide repeated measures in long format. Age represents the age of the study participant in years at the time of the measurement.

name: edu_f1_
label: Primary father figure's level of education based on the highest on-going or completed education. Provide repeated measures in long format. Age represents the age of the study participant in years at the time of the measurement.

name: edu_f1_fath_
label: Type of primary father figure in edu_f1. Provide repeated measures in long format. Age represents the age of the study participant in years at the time of the measurement.

name: occup_f1_
label: Occupational status of primary father figure. Provide repeated measures in long format. Age represents the age of the study participant in years at the time of the measurement.

name: occup_f1_fath
label: Type of primary father figure in occup_f1. Provide repeated measures in long format. Age represents the age of the study participant in years at the time of the measurement.

name: hhincome_
label: Total yearly income of the parent's household during the childhood of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format. Age represents the age of the study participant in years at the time of the measurement.

name: cohab_
label: Cohabitation status of the mother: are her and her partner living together? Provide repeated measures in long format. Age represents the age of the study participant in years at the time of the measurement.

name: breastfed_excl
label: Total duration of exclusive breastfeeding (of the study participant), in months

name: breastfed_any
label: Total duration of any breastfeeding (of the study participant), in months

name: breastfed_ever
label: Was the study participant ever breast fed

name: solid_food
label: Age of the study participant in months when solid food was introduced

name: childcare_intro
label: At what age (in months) the study participant started childcare?

name: childcare_0
label: Study participant was cared for by care givers other than parents  during 1st year of life (age range ≥0 and <1 year)

name: childcare_1
label: Study participant was cared for by care givers other than parents  during 2nd year of life (age range ≥1 and <2 years)

name: childcare_2
label: Study participant was cared for by care givers other than parents  during 3rd year of life (age range ≥2 and <3 years)

name: childcare_3
label: Study participant was cared for by care givers other than parents  during 4th year of life (age range ≥3 and <4 years)

name: childcarerel_0
label: Study participant was cared for by relatives, friends, nanny, babysitter or au pair during 1st year of life (age range ≥0 and <1 year)

name: childcarerel_1
label: Study participant was cared for by relatives, friends, nanny, babysitter or au pair during 2nd year of life (age range ≥1 and <2 years)

name: childcarerel_2
label: Study participant was cared for by relatives, friends, nanny, babysitter or au pair during 3rd year of life (age range ≥2 and <3 years)

name: childcarerel_3
label: Study participant was cared for by relatives, friends, nanny, babysitter or au pair during 4th year of life (age range ≥3 and <4 years)

name: childcareprof_0
label: Study participant was cared for by a professional child minder during 1st year of life (age range ≥0 and <1 year)

name: childcareprof_1
label: Study participant was cared for by a professional child minder during 2nd year of life (age range ≥1 and <2 year)

name: childcareprof_2
label: Study participant was cared for by a professional child minder during 3rd year of life (age range ≥2 and <3 years)

name: childcareprof_3
label: Study participant was cared for by a professional child minder during 4th year of life (age range ≥3 and <4 years)

name: childcarecentre_0
label: Study participant was attending a day care centre during the 1st year of life (age range ≥0 and <1 year)

name: childcarecentre_1
label: Study participant was attending a day care centre during the 2nd year of life (age range ≥1 and <2 year)

name: childcarecentre_2
label: Study participant was attending a day care centre during the 3rd year of life (age range ≥2 and <3 years)

name: childcarecentre_3
label: Study participant was attending a day care centre during the 4th year of life (age range ≥3 and <4 years)

name: sex
label: Sex of the study participant

name: birth_year
label: Year of birth

name: birth_month
label: Month of birth

name: ga_lmp
label: Gestational age based on last menstrual period in days

name: ga_us
label: Gestational age based on ultrasound

name: ga_mr
label: Gestational age based on maternal report

name: ga_bj
label: Best clinical judgement decided by the study estimating the most accurately measure of gestational age obtained within the study

name: mode_delivery
label: Mode of delivery

name: cob
label: Country of birth

name: ethn1
label: Ethnic background based on country of origin

name: ethn2
label: Ethnic background based on colour

name: ethn3
label: Best estimate of ethnic background based on ethn1 or ethn2 and study's own discretion

name: region_birth
label: "Region of birth,  adapted from the World Bank classification"

name: edu
label: Education of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: occup
label: Occupational status of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: hhincome_own
label: Total yearly household of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: famsize_adult_own
label: Total number of adults in the same household of study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: famsize_child_own
label: Total number of children under 18 years old in the household of study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: smk_ever
label: Has the study participant ever smoked regularly? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: smk_cess
label: Age in years when the study participant stopped smoking. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: smk_cig
label: Average number of cigarettes smoked per day. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: smk_curr
label: Current smoking status. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: alc
label: Does the study participant currently drink alcohol? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: alc_unit
label: Average units of alcohol per week. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: outdoor
label: Time spent playing outdoors. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: outdoor_season
label: Season of outdoor collection. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: sedentary_time
label: Total screen time per day (time spent watching TV / playing video games / using a tablet
variableNameRegexp: a smartphone). Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: pa_mod_vig
label: Total duration of moderate to vigorous physical activity per week. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: pa_mod
label: Total duration of moderate physical activity per week based on METs classification (3-6 METs). Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: pa_vig
label: Total duration of vigorous physical activity per week based on METs classification (>6 METs). Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: sleep_duration
label: Time spent sleeping per day. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: diet_veg
label: "Vegetables intake, without potatoes. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure."

name: diet_fruit
label: Fruits intake. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: diet_fish
label: Fish and fish products intake. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: diet_swebev
label: Sugar-sweetened beverages intake. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: diet_na
label: Sodium intake. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: diet_kcal
label: Daily kcal intake. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: birth_length
label: Length of the study participant at birth

name: birth_weight
label: Weight of the study participant at birth

name: height_
label: Height of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure. This does not include the birth length.

name: weight_
label: Weight of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure. This does not include the birth weight.

name: waistcirc_
label: Waist circumference of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure.

name: hipcirc_
label: Hip circumference of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure.

name: ap_age
label: Age at adiposity peak in days. Age when the individual experienced their highest BMI between birth and 2 years.

name: ap_bmi
label: BMI at adiposity peak. Highest BMI reached between birth and 2 years.

name: ar_age
label: Age at adiposity rebound in days. Age when the individual experienced their lowest BMI.

name: ar_bmi
label: BMI at adiposity rebound. BMI when the individual experienced their lowest adiposity.

name: phv_age
label: Age at which the individual experienced their fastest upward growth in their stature. Note: this can be estimated only if the participant has at least two height measures recorded between ages 5 and 20 years AND at least one of the height measures recorded at or after age 9 years

name: voice_break_age
label: Age at which voice started to change/break (males only)

name: menarche_age
label: Age at menarche (females only)

name: tanner_breast
label: Tanner stages (I-V) of breast development (females only). Provide repeated measures in long format. Age represents the age of the study participant in years at the time of the measurement.

name: tanner_genit
label: Tanner stages (I-V) of testes, scrotum, and penis development (males only). Provide repeated measures in long format. Age represents the age of the study participant in years at the time of the measurement.

name: tanner_pubhair
label: Tanner stages (I-V) of pubic hair development. Provide repeated measures in long format. Age represents the age of the study participant in years at the time of the measurement.

name: menopause_age
label: Age at menopause in years (females only)

name: glucose_cord
label: Glucose measured in cord blood

name: glucose_
label: Blood glucose of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure.

name: hba1c_cord
label: Hemoglobin 1Ac (HbA1c) measured from cord blood

name: hba1c_
label: Blood Hemoglobin 1Ac (HbA1c) of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure.

name: insulin_cord
label: Insulin measured in cord blood

name: insulin_
label: Blood insulin of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure.

name: sbp_
label: Systolic blood pressure (1st measurement of the assessment) of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure.

name: dbp_
label: Diastolic blood pressure  (1st measurement of the assessment) of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure.

name: sbpav_
label: Systolic blood pressure (average of multiple measures at same assessment) of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure.

name: dbpav_
label: Diastolic blood pressure (average of multiple measures at same assessment) of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure.

name: pulse_
label: Average pulse rate (if multiple measures at same assessment) of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure.

name: crpwv_
label: Carotid-radial pulse wave velocity of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure.

name: cfpwv_
label: Carotid-femoral pulse wave velocity of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days.

name: cimt_
label: Carotid intima-media thickness of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure.

name: cimtmeanmax
label: Is the reported carotid intima-media thickness mean or maximum? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days.

name: chol_cord
label: Total cholesterol measured in cord blood.

name: chol_
label: Total cholesterol of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure.

name: hdlc_cord
label: High-density lipoprotein cholesterol (HDLc) measured in cord blood.

name: hdlc_
label: High-density lipoprotein cholesterol (HDLc) of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure.

name: ldlc_cord
label: Low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDLc) measured in cord blood.

name: ldlc_
label: Low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDLc) of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure.

name: vldlc_cord
label: Very low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (vLDLc) measured in cord blood.

name: vldlc_
label: Very low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (vLDLc) of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure.

name: triglycerides_cord
label: Triglycerides measured in cord blood

name: triglycerides_
label: Triglycerides in long format of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure.

name: crp_cord
label: C-reactive protein (CRP) measured in cord blood

name: crp_
label: C-reactive protein (CRP) of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure.

name: il6_cord
label: Interleukin 6 (IL-6) measured in cord blood

name: il6_
label: Interleukin 6 (IL-6) of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days and method for each measure.

name: diab_t2_icd
label: Type 2 diabetes based on ICD10 code. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: diab_t2_sr
label: Type 2 diabetes based on self-reported measure. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: hypertension
label: Hypertension status based on physician diagnosis: either being told by a physician or medical records.  Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: hypertension_med
label: Use of anti-hypertensive medication. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: chd_hard
label: Has the study participant had coronary events (hard definition)? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: chd_broad
label: Has the study participant had coronary events (broad definition)? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: chd_ap
label: Coronary events and incidents: Angina pectoris. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: chd_mi
label: Coronary events and incidents: Myocardial infarction. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: chd_acs
label: Coronary events and incidents: Acute coronary syndrome. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: chd_revasc
label: Coronary events and incidents: Coronary revascularisation procedures. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: chd_cabg
label: Coronary events and incidents: Coronary artery bypass graft. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: chd_si
label: Coronary events and incidents: Silent ischemia. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: car_plaques
label: Carotid plaques. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: death
label: Indicator variable for death of the individual. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: death_cause
label: Cause of death.

name: hosp
label: Was the study participant hospitalized? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (hosp_range).

name: hosp_range
label: Time range in months to which hosp refers to. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: hosp_n
label: How many times the study participant was hospitalized? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (hosp_n_range).

name: hosp_n_range
label: Time range in months to which hosp_n refers to. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: hosp_nights
label: Total number of nights of hospitalization reported in hosp_n. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: visits_range
label: Time range to which following visit data refers to. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: visits_dentist
label: How many times the study participant has seen dentist or dental hygiensit? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (visits_range).

name: visits_orthodontist
label: How many times the study participant has seen orthodontist? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (visits_range).

name: visits_gp
label: How many times the study participant has seen GP or family doctor? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (visits_range).

name: visits_specialist
label: How many times the study participant has seen any health care specialist (i.e. non-GP visit)? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (visits_range).

name: visits_nurse
label: How many times the study participant has seen nurse (incl. midwife, physician assistant, GP-assistant)? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (visits_range).

name: drugs_range
label: Time range to which following drug use data refers to. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: drugs_a
label: A) Alimentary tract and metabolism drug use. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (drugs_range).

name: drugs_b
label: B) Blood and blood forming organs drug use. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (drugs_range).

name: drugs_c
label: C) Cardiovascular system drug use. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (drugs_range).

name: drugs_d
label: D) Dermatological drug use. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (drugs_range).

name: drugs_g
label: G) Genito-urinary system and sex hormones drug use. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (drugs_range).

name: drugs_h
label: H) Systemic hormonal preparations, excluding sex hormones and insulins drug use. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (drugs_range).

name: drugs_j
label: J) Anti-infectives for systemic drug use. Also indicate the age or time range (drugs_range) to which visit data refers to.

name: drugs_l
label: L) Antineoplastic and immunomodulating agents drug use. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (drugs_range).

name: drugs_m
label: M) Musculo-skeletal system drug use. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (drugs_range).

name: drugs_n
label: N) Nervous system drug use. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (drugs_range).

name: drugs_p
label: P) Antiparasitic products, insecticides and repellents drug use. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (drugs_range).

name: drugs_r
label: R) Respiratory system drug use. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (drugs_range).

name: drugs_s
label: S) Sensory organs drug use. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (drugs_range).

name: drugs_v
label: V) Various drug use. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (drugs_range).
